```{r merge data}

library(here)
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)
library(psych)


w1<- import(here("Add Health", "raw data", "ICPSR_21600", "DS0001", "21600-0001-Data.rda"))
w2<- import(here("Add Health", "raw data", "ICPSR_21600 2", "DS0005", "21600-0005-Data.rda"))
w3<- import(here("Add Health", "raw data", "ICPSR_21600 3", "DS0008", "21600-0008-Data.rda"))
w4<- import(here("Add Health", "raw data", "ICPSR_21600 4", "DS0022", "21600-0022-Data.rda"))

w1 <- w1 %>%
  select(AID,
         H1GI8,
         H1GI20,
    H1TO14, H1TO15, H1TO16,
     H1TO20:H1TO24,
    H1TO40, H1TO51, H1TO52) %>%
   rename(race = H1GI8,
         w1_grade = H1GI20,
         w1_agefirstdrink = H1TO14, 
         w1_pastyralcusedays = H1TO15, 
         w1_drinksoccasion = H1TO16,
         w1_parentprobs = H1TO20,
         w1_schoolprobs = H1TO21,
         w1_friendprobs = H1TO22,
         w1_dateprobs = H1TO23,
         w1_regrets = H1TO24,
    w1_agefirstdrug = H1TO40, 
    w1_accessalc = H1TO51, 
    w1_accessdrug = H1TO52)
  

w3<- w3 %>%
  select(AID,
         H3TO38, 
         ##nonprescription drug use 
         H3TO105A:H3TO105E) %>%
  rename(w3_pastyralcusedays = H3TO38, 
         w3_sedative = H3TO105A,
         w3_tranquil = H3TO105B,
         w3_stimul = H3TO105C,
         w3_painkill = H3TO105D,
         w3_steroid = H3TO105E)

w4 <- w4 %>%
  select(AID,
         H4OD1Y,
         H4TO35, 
         H4TO63) %>%
  rename(w4_pastyralcusedays = H4TO35,
         w4_nmpdu = H4TO63)


newdata<- merge(w1, w3, by= "AID")
dtotal <- merge(newdata, w4, by= "AID")


dtotal<- dtotal %>%
  mutate(w1_age = 1995-H4OD1Y,
         w3_age = 2001-H4OD1Y,
         w4_age = 2008-H4OD1Y)

head(dtotal)

```
